articles.title: Mansfield’s Xfinity Center undergoing biggest renovation in its nearly 40-year history
articles.description:
Ever since it opened in 1986, the Xfinity Center has undergone a number of changes, from basic upkeep to expanded seating to a series of name changes that hasn’t stopped many locals from continuing to call it Great Woods a full quarter of a century after that name was retired.
